attributes.action: legalise cannabis for personal use to study the health benefits of cannabis
attributes.additional_details: The taxes from the sales of this legal weed could be used to benefit the country possibly bringing in millions in funding for the national health service and schools,this funding is much needed.And as weed has been legalised in many other countries i believe it is time for the united kingdom to also do so
attributes.background: Many people in the united kingdom use cannabis for personal use and legalising it would take money away from the money organised crime may be using the money for other illegal activity.Making it available in shops for people over 18 and possibly for people to grow it in their own homes.
